mapper.update: update nl_datatable set db_id = #{dbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dt_id = #{dtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dt_name = #{dtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dt_time = #{dtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, show_flag = #{showFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, db_id, dt_id, dt_name, dt_time, show_flag from nl_datatable
